item.description:
REGISTRATION REQUIRED at http://www.nhccs.org/


Rescuing the Constitution: The Destructive Effects of Progressivism What were the people of the early 20th century attempting to remedy by approving the Progressive led
assault upon the Framers' Constitution? What were they thinking when they voted to ratify
the 16th Amendment and the 17th Amendment to radically alter
the Framers' Plan of Government?
Featured Topics & Speakers...

The Honorable Dan Itse:
Can administrative agency rules lawfully enjoy the full force and effect of law when
a State Constitution specifically vests the supreme legislative power in a Senate and House of Representatives?

Dr. Ralph Rossum:
James Madison, Father of the American Constitution, declared that the Constitution set up a
government that was neither wholly national nor wholly federal, but both. Is that still true?

Dr. Lee Button:
The Ten Commandments form the basis of American Civil Law. Thus, religion is liberating and not the
enemy of personal liberty, as some would make it out to be.

Dr. Edwin Vieira:
How does the existence of the Federal Reserve Bank fit into the Framers' plan for a limited government?
In whose hands does control of America's economic system really lie? Is it controlled by our
national government or is it controlled by private hands?

An Audience Driven - Q & A Panel Session Will Close Out the Evening's Activities.
item.name: Rescuing the Constitution dinner conference, feat Edwin Vieira
